entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 27. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 14. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
